scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m "update with deploy" && git push && git push heroku master && wsl heroku logs --tail
scripts.build: linux: yarn run clear && yarn run compile && pkg build/compile/index.js --target node16-linux-x64 --output build/output/bot-linux
scripts.build: macos: yarn run clear && yarn run compile && pkg build/compile/index.js --target node16-macos-x64 --output build/output/bot-macos
scripts.build: window: yarn run clear && yarn run compile && pkg build/compile/index.js --target node16-win-x64 --output build/output/bot-window.exe
